Package com.payd.shooti.ui.actors

Class UIButton

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Group
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.WidgetGroup
com.payd.shooti.ui.actors.UIGroup
com.payd.shooti.ui.actors.UIButton
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Cullable, com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Layout, IUIElement
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArrowButton, HoloBaseButton, ImageButton, TextButton, UICheckbox
public abstract class UIButton extends UIGroup
UIButton class encompasses a UI element which is intended to react to pointer input. It is a subclass of UIGroup, and as such can contain other UI elements.

UIButton is abstract with 3 abstract function: onEnter, onExit, and onClick.

UIButton can be locked, which will prevent it from reacting to pointer input.
